definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 本活动保留驱离酗酒与神智不清者之权利。

sentences.english: A bamboo stripped of all but the top tuft of leaves is placed in the yard to scare away ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 后院会放只保留顶束叶片的竹子以驱离鬼魂。

sentences.english: They are not yet a spent force, but time is running out for them very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 他们还未到强弩之末，但是时机在快速驱离他们。

sentences.english: The authorities dragooned the peasants into leaving their farms .
sentences.chinese: 当局用武力把农民驱离田庄。

definition: to drive (vehicle)/to drive out/to chase away/to herd (people towards a gate)
to start out on a trip/to dispatch troops
to steer (the plane) away from/to drive away (from a place)/to leave
to return to the point of departure
